api.metadesc: Best QR code API for sharing URLs, text, vCards, files! Generate and download static and dynamic QR codes from your application, upload your own files.
api.title: API

app.apierror: Something went wrong. QR code could not be generated

contact.contact: If you have questions or suggestions or would like a custom solution - please contact us
contact.getback: We'll get back to you shortly

app.launchpro:
Create a PRO account in seconds and start enjoying 14 days trial absolutely for free.

Before proceeding to the PRO make sure that you read Privacy policy and Terms of service
app.metadesc: Create attractive QR codes, choose your style, download as SVG, PNG, PDF or PS. QR code API, scans analytics. Easy to use online QR code generator
app.metatitle: QR code generator - free QR codes with logos and text
app.poorcontrast: This QR code may not be recognised by some devices, try changing style or color settings

pricing.exrateexplanation: The actual price in {curr} may be slightly different at the moment of payment depending on the current conversion rate from EUR
pricing.featuredemo: Generate and download QR codes in different styles and colors
pricing.featurelibrary: Upload and use your own logos, templates and presets
pricing.metadesc: Always free static QR codes. Free 14-day trial for dynamic QR codes. Track scans of your QR codes, use QR code API, upload your content
pricing.metatitle: QR code generator - Plans and Pricing

contact.description: ScanMeFindMe allows you to quickly create a page with the contact information of a person or an organisation. It can include the photo or logo, names, phone numbers, email, URL, links to various social network profiles, address and notes. When clients scan this QR code they will be able to see all of this data and immediately contact you or save it to their phone contacts.
contact.title: Contact information

features.api: Use API to generate codes quickly from your own application
features.domain: Coming soon: use your own domain for short URLs
features.dynamic: Change information at any moment after the QR code was printed
features.shorturl: Dynamic QR codes link to the short URLs, which means smaller matrix in the QR codes. The patterns can have a lower density which makes them look better, and easier to scan
features.statistics: You are able to view statistics on how often each code was scanned, from which location and from which device

dynamic.featuresheader: Main features of the dynamic QR codes:

page.description: This is useful when you want to share some information or files with your clients. The ways to use these are unlimited, they can include:

examples.albums: Photo albums, music samples and many more
examples.manual: Instructions manuals for appliances in a hotel or Airbnb
examples.menu: Menus for a restaurant or a cafe
examples.products: Additional information for products or exhibition items

page.title: Page with files

dynamic.subtitle: Dynamic QR codes live up to their name. You can dynamically change information after you have printed the QR code. Dynamic QR codes are only available with the ScanMeFindMe PRO
dynamic.title: Dynamic QR codes
dynamic.typesheader: Currently, ScanMeFindMe offers three types of dynamic codes:

url.description: Your client will be immediately redirected to another website. You can create links to google forms or documents, a registration page for an event, surveys, etc. The QR code will point to a short URL (which provides a smaller matrix), at any moment, you can change where the URL redirects to, and track how often it is scanned.
url.title: URL redirection

product.metatitle: QR code generator - Static and dynamic codes, analytics and more

freefeatures.download: Download one code at a time in PNG or SVG format
freefeatures.generate: Generate QR codes for URLs, phone numbers, contact information, calendar events and more.
freefeatures.logos: Choose from over {no} different logos for any occasion to add to your QR code
freefeatures.styles: Select from over {no} different styles for the QR codes
freefeatures.templates: Add frames and captions to the generated QR codes

profeatures.api: Use API to quickly generate codes from your own application
profeatures.bulkdownload: Download multiple codes on one page ready for printing,you can specify margins, number of repeats, etc
profeatures.download: Download codes in PNG, SVG, PS and PDF formats
profeatures.logos: Upload your own logos to use in QR codes
profeatures.presets: Create your own presets - a combination of the QR style settings, apply these presets to the new QR codes in one click
profeatures.save: Save generated QR codes and be able to print them at any moment
profeatures.templates: Create your own templates and choose where to display captions

static.subtitle: With ScanMeFindMe.com you can generate QR codes for static contents for free. "Static" means that the content of the QR codes can not be changed after they are printed.
static.title: Static QR codes
static.withfree: With the free version you can:
static.withpro: In the PRO Account you can also:

product.title: Product

app.translationnotavailable: This page is not available in {lang}, below you can find the text in {actuallang}.
app.translationnotyetavailable: Sorry, this page is not yet available in {lang}, below you can find the text in {actuallang}. We are actively working on translations!

validation.invalidurl: Enter a valid website or URL, it must start with http:// or https://
validation.maxlengthexceeded: Can not be longer than {maxlength} characters
validation.mecardrequired: Either First name or Last name is required
validation.minlengthexceeded: Can not be shorter than {minlength} characters
validation.nospaces: Password can not starts and ends with whitespaces
validation.pathcontain: Path can only contain latin characters, digits, or symbols '-', '_'
validation.pathminlength: Path has to be at least {num} characters
validation.pathstartend: Path can start and end with only letters or digits
validation.vcardrequired: Either First name or Last name or Organisation is required

app.withproversioncontact: With PRO account you can store more information, such as a photo and social network links. You can also track views!
app.withproversionfile: With PRO version you can upload your own files and track views!
app.withproversionurl: With PRO version you can create short URLs and track views!

api.confirmdelete: Are you sure you want to delete this key?
api.createdesc: Create a static or dynamic QR code
api.descriptionapikeys: You can create as many API keys as you need. Usually it is recommended to create separate API key for each person who uses them and also a separate key for each automated system. In this case you can always delete only one key if it was compromised and other people will not be affected. Add the comments to the keys to remember what they are for.
api.descriptiontempfiles:
Temporary files can only be used in the API calls and are automatically deleted after two days.

Call API to add more files or upload them directly here:
api.nofolderupload: Your browser does not support folder upload
api.nokeys: You don't have any API keys yet

billing.billingdesc: You will be immediately charged {amount} for the first year and subscribe for recurring payments. You can cancel subscription at any time
billing.nosubscription: Oops it looks like you don't have any current subscription
billing.stripedesc:
ScanMeFindMe uses Stripe payment system to manage subscriptions. You are about to be redirected to your customer portal in Stripe where you can view past payment receipts, change your payment method, update your billing information, cancel or update your plan.

If you cancel the plan it will be cancelled in the end of the billing period.

If you update the plan it will be updated immediately.
billing.stripedescrenewal:
You are about to be redirected to your customer portal in Stripe where you can renew your subscription.

If you also want to change your plan, you need to renew the current subscription first and after that you will be upgrade or downgrade.
billing.yourplanended: If you decide not to purchase a plan your account will be automatically deleted on {date}

pro.codenotfound: Oops, something went wrong. Is this a valid code? Try to refresh the page

presets.savedesc: Save the current QR style as a preset that you can use with other QR codes. You can manage your presets in the library
presets.subtitle: Preset is a combination of the QR style settings, logo, colors, templates. Save time generating multiple QR codes.

profile.confirmdeleteaccount1: Your account will be deactivated immediately. You will no longer be able to login with this email.
profile.confirmdeleteaccount2: Your API keys will be deactivated.
profile.confirmdeleteaccount4: All your remaining data, your account and all payment information (if present) will be completely deleted within {days} days. You will receive no more communication from ScanMeFindMe.
profile.confirmdeletedata: All your static and dynamic codes, API keys and all items in the library will be immediately and permanently deleted. This operation can not be undone.
